subtitle: A one-pot meal.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Lightly grease a round ovenproof dish.
Place sausages under a medium preheated grill. Grill for 10-12 min, turning frequently, until cooked. Set aside.
Place the butter and water in a saucepan. Heat gently until melted. Bring to the boil then remove from heat.

Beat in the flour and seasoning until smooth and the mixture leaves the sides of the pan. Add enough beaten egg to form a smooth glossy mixture - but not too much, otherwise the mixture will become too runny.
Place spoonfuls of the mixture around the edge of the ovenproof dish. Cook in the oven for 25-30 min or until risen and golden.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and garlic. Fry for 2 min until softened. Add the pepper. Fry for 1 min.
Add the olives, tomatoes and seasoning to the pan. Slice the cooked sausage diagonally. Add to the pan. Simmer for 10 min.
Spoon into the centre of the gougere crust. Sprinkle the remaining cheese around the edge of the pastry. Serve.

title: Chunky sausage stew with a gougere crust
